Subject: Healthcare Security Measures

What security measures are advised for Kubernetes in healthcare settings? We need to ensure the safety and integrity of our patients' data. Could you please offer guidance on the best practices for securing Kubernetes in healthcare environments?. My contact number is +86-10-8500-1234.
